name: Starship Phoenix
description: The year 2186. You are on the Starship Phoenix. You were here with your parents. But they aren’t here anymore. Nobody is. Some of the ship’s crew went on a mission, but something went wrong. None of them came back. But something else did. The ship was damaged, the crew wiped out. You survived. And now you’re all alone. Can you survive in space all by yourself?
